heroSection.title: Women Coding Community
heroSection.description: Empowering Women in Their Tech Careers

programmesSection.title: Opportunities and Programmes
programmesSection.description: Join our community and unlock endless opportunities. Network, find mentors, and access leadership programs. Whether you're aiming to enhance your skills, grow your professional network, or advance your career, we have what you need. We offer a wide range of opportunities to help you achieve your goals.

announcementSection.title: Mentorship ad-hoc registration is open now
announcementSection.description: Sign up for this unique opportunity of one-time mentoring sessions with personalised guidance from experienced mentors.

images.alt: Two women speaking during ad-hoc session

events.date: THU, MAY 30, 2024, 8:00 PM to 9:30 PM CEST
events.title: Book Club: The Pragmatic Programmer
events.speaker: John Smith
events.description: Join us for a discussion of this essential guide to writing clear and maintainable code. We recommend that our attendees read the book before the event, however you are welcome to join us, even if you have only read the first chapter. The more, the merrier!

images.alt: Two women speaking during ad-hoc session
